reviews.text: Domestic food is the best. In this place unforgivable. All the best ‚ù§Ô∏è

This is the fifth or sixth chance that I‚Äôve given them to improve, but I will definitely not be eating again after today. Four of us ordered food, we ordered quite a lot, the restaurant is five minutes away from our location and still the food was totally cold, tasted weird and the portions were tiny (picture of the grilled vegetable portion size attached). Their food is not cheap and the value for money just isn‚Äôt worth it

This place is the standard for a good coffee and fresh cakes! That's, however, not the only thing that's been offered. You can also have either a quick bite or a proper meal. Wi-Fi is included and location is veryconvenient.  It's nearby the "Socijalno" tram station. Outside seating is also possible. Pleasant service as well is somewhat of a standard there.
Once upon a time one of the favorite places in town but unfortunately not any longer..capuchino served almost cold... writers could be more present and available

Tourists stay away from this place. To say the incredibly disrespectful staff member in glasses ruined our day is an understatement. Note there was no language barrier because she spoke English and we were one of 3 in the store. What a shame to ruin the friendly experience we had in Sarajevo üòä‚ùå.
